Varadero

Beautiful beaches next to picturesque and bright-coloured houses.The greatest thing about Varadero is how it shows its wealth of resources with such charming humility.

Varadero

Beaches such as Varadero or Playa Coral are among the most famous in Cuba, and the perfect place to relax on vacation. Diving or snorkelling and discovering the wealth of marine biodiversity is something you really shouldn't miss. If you like adventure, this is also the perfect place for water sports.

And in the Saturn Caves or Varahicacos Ecological Reserve you can discover an enormous variety of native flora and fauna. In the evening, the lively nightlife in Varadero will keep you dancing to the Cuban beat.

The Hicacos Peninsula, better known as VARADERO, is the largest and one of the most popular beach resort in Cuba. Its pristine 21 km (13mi) long white sand beach is considered by many to be one of the most beautiful in the world. Thousands of visitors come to Varadero every year to relax and enjoy the calm turquoise waters and warm sun of this Caribbean paradise, but Varadero has much more to offer than just a glorious beach. Although it lacks some of the authenticity and cultural-rich environment found in colonial cities such as Havana or Santiago de Cuba, Varadero still provides a taste of the Cuban culture with its numerous art galleries, museums, cabarets, quaint bars and cafes, handicrafts markets, live music, cigar and rum shops, etc.

Watersports, such as diving, snorkeling, sailing, fishing, catamaran cruise, kite surfing, glass-bottom boat, etc., is of course a predominant sector of activities offered all year long. Nature lovers can also take a break from the beach to enjoy hiking trails, caves, ancient wall paintings, and the fauna and flora of the Varahicacos Ecological Reserve.

Things to Do

Attraction

Delfinario

Hang out with dolphins, enjoy the charms of the Caribbean sea with them.Hang out with dolphins, enjoy the charms of the Caribbean sea with them. Find out everything you wanted to know about dolphins.

Water sports

Dive Adventure

Dive Adventure Havana gives you the opportunity to discover the amazing world of recreational diving and to share this sport in safe, exciting and funny way.

Cycling

RutaBikes

Welcome to RutaBikes! Since 2012 we offer Bike City tours in Havana, as well as bikes rental for self-exploring the city or for long journeys along Cuba.

Parks & Beaches

Park

Parque Josone

Parque Josone (Josone Park), in the center of the Cuban city of Varadero, is a beautiful nine-hectare garden where you can enjoy the tranquillity of the shade of a palm tree or a pleasant boat ride on the lake inside.

Beach

Varadero Beach

Amazing beautiful beach, crystal clear blue water, can walk far out still in depth, gorgeous warm water, stunning white powder sand which goes on for miles and miles, our happy place.

Beach

Playa Coral

Playa Coral is one of the most beautiful locations on the island because of its fine white sand, crystal clear waters and 2 km long coral reefs. All this makes it a great place for water sports such as snorkelling or scuba diving
